array.name: ratinale_list
array.item: This lets this app to access your calendar events. To enable this, click App Settings below and activate Calendar under the Permissions menu.
This lets this app capture images and videos from the camera. To enable this, click App Settings below and activate Camera under the Permissions menu.
This lets this app to read or add contacts. To enable this, click App Settings below and activate Contacts under the Permissions menu.
This lets this app to access your location. To enable this, click App Settings below and activate Location under the Permissions menu.
This lets this app to access or record audio. To enable this, click App Settings below and activate Microphone under the Permissions menu.
This lets this app to pause sounds during incoming phone calls to avoid noise. To enable this, click App Settings below and activate Phone under the Permissions menu.
This lets this app to detect body sensors. To enable this, click App Settings below and activate Body Sensors under the Permissions menu.
This lets this app to access or send messages. To enable this, click App Settings below and activate SMS under the Permissions menu.
This lets this app store and access information like photos on your phone and its SD card. To enable this, click App Settings below and activate Storage under the Permissions menu.
